snippet.title: Lifeslide Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an atmospheric paper plane flight adventure through life and master a unique flight mechanic as you travel through an ever-changing landscape towards your destination.

Get it or try the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/956140/Lifeslide/
Join the community: https://discord.gg/bkYDq8v
